resources.name: Civic Center Transit Center
resources.details: Major transit hub serving Red and Blue lines with bus connections and covered waiting areas. Features ticket vending machines, security cameras, and digital arrival displays.

resources.name: Union Station
resources.details: Historic station serving Red and Blue lines with indoor waiting area, ticket machines, and connection to Union Station attractions. Features amenities including restrooms and food options nearby.

resources.name: Central West End
resources.details: Busy station serving Blue line with covered platform and direct connections to BJC Medical Campus and Washington University School of Medicine. Features bike racks and security presence.

resources.name: Shrewsbury-Lansdowne I-44
resources.details: End-of-line station for Blue line with large park-and-ride lot (815 spaces), bus connections, and covered waiting areas. Features bike lockers and ticket vending machines.

resources.name: Lambert Airport Terminal 1

location.address: 10701 Lambert International Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63145

resources.details: Airport station serving Red line with covered platform and direct access to Terminal 1. Features luggage-friendly design, digital information displays, and heightened security presence.

resources.name: Lambert Airport Terminal 2

location.address: 10701 Lambert International Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63145

resources.details: End-of-line station for Red line with covered platform and direct access to Terminal 2. Features luggage racks, enhanced lighting, and security cameras.

resources.name: 8th & Pine
resources.details: Underground station serving Red and Blue lines in downtown with access to business district. Features ticket machines, security cameras, and nearby attractions including City Garden.

resources.name: Stadium
resources.details: Station serving Red and Blue lines with direct access to Busch Stadium. Features extended hours during sporting events and concerts, ticket vending machines, and enhanced security during events.
resources.hours: 4:30 AM - 1:15 AM daily, extended during events

resources.name: UMSL South

location.address: 7798 Natural Bridge Rd, St. Louis, MO 63121

resources.details: Campus station serving Red line with covered platform, ticket machines, and direct access to University of Missouri-St. Louis south campus. Features bike racks and nearby student housing.

resources.name: Forest Park-DeBaliviere
resources.details: Transfer station for Red and Blue lines with bus connections and parking. Features covered waiting areas, ticket machines, and access to Forest Park attractions.
